title: One-man show hopes to reframe how we think about Thomas Paine
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Ian Ruskin, actor and writer of the one-man show, "To Begin the World Again: The Life of Thomas Paine," hopes to change the way we think about Paine and his place in history.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: One-man show hopes to reframe how we think about Thomas Paine
itunes:summary: Ian Ruskin, actor and writer of the one-man show, "To Begin the World Again: The Life of Thomas Paine," hopes to change the way we think about Paine and his place in history.
